pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 1 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
I just went through your submission and everything looks good with the exception of one request and one issue::

**Request:**

Can you please submit a comparison of the lighting and camera coverage on `X2C5` vs your changes on this `X2C8` in image form? Side-by-side comparison of the camera view in the starting area from RViz would be sufficient.

If the difference is apparent in the screenshots \(as claimed\), the value added by this model submission will be apparent.

**Issue:**

Please work with your `urdf` file to ensure visualization is functional in RViz or re-use the default one from `x2_description` as a worse-case scenario. I encountered some issues with visualization when attempting to visualize the model using `robot_description` in RViz.

‌

P.S. please update your PR to merge onto `urban_circuit` as opposed to `default`.
content.html:
I just went through your submission and everything looks good with the exception of one request and one issue::

Request:

Can you please submit a comparison of the lighting and camera coverage on X2C5 vs your changes on this X2C8 in image form? Side-by-side comparison of the camera view in the starting area from RViz would be sufficient.

If the difference is apparent in the screenshots (as claimed), the value added by this model submission will be apparent.

Issue:

Please work with your urdf file to ensure visualization is functional in RViz or re-use the default one from x2_description as a worse-case scenario. I encountered some issues with visualization when attempting to visualize the model using robot_description in RViz.

‌

P.S. please update your PR to merge onto urban_circuit as opposed to default.
